title:
They\'ve been clearing and doing work for some time at this location, but I don\'t know what will be there.  What is planning on being built across from the Food Lion, near the corner of Carolina Beach Rd. and Independence Blvd? 



By the way, I really enjoy the Q&A format of the myReporter section of the site.  I read it all the time.
